title: Apr 8 Kick-off meeting Q&A thread
body: Q&A thread in support of the 8 April Kick-off meeting
author: emu-gov

comments.body: Hello all, is there a public accessible FedRAMP 20X roadmap or timeline that details when to expect updates/decision points that align with this (FedRAMP20X) effort?
comments.author: BV1722

replies.body:
There is no public roadmap or timeline currently published.

The [20x FAQ](https://www.fedramp.gov/20x/faqs/) or [Phase 1 explanation](https://www.fedramp.gov/20x/phase-one/) may help to outline some of the short-term goals.
replies.author: emu-gov
